name: RPG Shop
description:
Overview

RPG Shop is a 3d first person simulation game where you work as a shop keeper and help others complete their quests in a fantasy universe.

There’s an in game achievements board, try to collect all of the achievements to beat the game. 😉

Reviews are always appreciated! 

Controls
  • Mouse - aim and interact, 
  • Space - proceed, 
  • X - cancel or say “No”.
Notes

The game was originally created in Ludum Dare 41 event. This is a polished version with lots of fixes and new content.
